divs: sighting details2 friends and i were camping near boreas pass colorado when dylan and i(john) witnessed, around 2:30 am 2 blue,green, yellow, red. flashing\pulsating orbs miles away moving in wave and spiral patterns; which we both observed through binoculars and a 7x rifle scope for a both 30 minutes before we went to sleep.
Summary: 2 blue,green, yellow, red. Flashing/pulsating orbs miles away moving in wave and spiral patterns
trends: There have been no other sightings in Como
This sighting has never been favorited.
